en-gb: Youth group making graffiti
Youth group making graffiti
es: El encargado de la biblioteca no puede ser localizado

en-gb: A citizen sends in a recording of the incident via the INSPEC2T app
es: Un ciudadano envía una grabación a través de la App de INSPEC2T

en-gb: The group makes more damage by throwing stones to the windows of the library
es: El grupo causa más daños lanzando piedras a las ventanas de la biblioteca

en-gb: When the patrol arrives, the group escapes
es: Cuando las patrullas llegan, el grupo escapa

en-gb: The patrol localizes one suspect, but is not sure that is implicated
es: La patrulla localiza a un sospechoso, pero no es seguro que esté implicado

en-gb: The supervisor recognizes one of the teenagers as a user of the library, making possible to catch the group
es: El supervisor reconoce a uno de los jóvenes como usuario de la biblioteca, haciendo posible identificar al resto del grupo

en-gb: Two drug-addicts are injecting heroine near the school
es: Dos toxicómanos inyectándose heroína junto a un colegio

en-gb: One of the fathers reprimands for their actions and starts arguing. He gets injured.
es: El padre de un alumno les reprocha su actitud y se inicia una pelea. Es herido

en-gb: A school-boy founds the syringe used by drug-addicts and pinches himself with a needle.
es: Un menor escolar se pincha con una aguja de una jeringuilla de los toxicómanos

en-gb: A witness records drug-addicts and the place where they leave their syringes
es: Un testigo graba a los toxicómanos y dónde dejan las jeringuillas

en-gb: Drug-addicts are identified, fined and the syringes are localized
es: Los toxicómanos son identificados y multados y las jeringuillas localizadas

en-gb: The injured receive medical assistance; one of the drug-addicts is arrested for the result of his aggression.
es: Los heridos son atendidos y uno de los toxicómanos es detenidos por el resultado de la agresión

en-gb: One of the drag-addicts is identified, but the other one tries to run, throwing away the syringes.
es: Uno de los toxicómanos es identificado pero el otro emprende la huida, tirando la jeringuill

en-gb: Two cars had an accident inside of the tunnel. The drivers started an argument
es: Accidente entre dos turismos en el interior de un túnel. Los conductores se enzarzan en una discusión.

en-gb: Other drivers are inattentive watching the scene; and another accident happen, this time with serious injuries.
es: Debido al efecto “mirón”, se produce otro accidente, esta vez con heridos graves.

en-gb: One of the injured dies without having been attended.
es: Uno de los heridos fallece al no ser atendido urgentemente

en-gb: One of the witnesses shares a photo of the incident with plates of the vehicles involved via INSPEC2T.
es: Un conductor testigo de los hechos comparte a través de INSPEC2T una foto con la matrícula de los vehículos implicados.

en-gb: The incident is reported, seriously wounded are taken to the hospital. One of the culprits runs.
es: Se instruye atestado y varios heridos graves son trasladados al hospital. Fuga de uno de los implicados en el accidente.

en-gb: The incident is reported, the traffic is brought back to normal, but one of the drivers involved managed to run.
es: Se instruye atestado y se normaliza el tráfico, pero una unidad implicada en el accidente ha huido.

en-gb: The incident is reported the victims are taken to the hospital if necessary, the traffic is brought back to normal, but one of the of the drivers involved ran and there was one death.
es: Se instruye atestado, se atiende a los heridos y se normaliza el tráfico, pero una unidad implicada en el accidente ha huido y hay un fallecido.

en-gb: The accident is taken care of and however one of the drivers ran, it was possible to localize him knowing license plate numbers of his car
es: Se logra atender el accidente, y pese a que un conductor ha huido, es localizado a través de la placa de matrícula de su vehículo.

en-gb: A group of young people is drinking alcohol in residential area with the music blasting from one of their cars
es: Un grupo de jóvenes se encuentra con sus vehículos en zona residencial con la música alta y bebiendo alcohol

en-gb: Upon seeing the patrol, they turn the music down. One of the vehicles tries to flee
es: Un grupo de jóvenes se encuentra con sus vehículos en zona residencial con la música alta y bebiendo alcohol

en-gb: A taxi driver is returning home sees the situation and reprimands the culprits, which causes a fight.
es: Un taxista que finaliza su turno de trabajo les llama la atención  y se inicia una pelea

en-gb: The claimant has photos of the whole situation and of license plates of cars involved taken.
es: El reclamante ha grabado la escena y posee imágenes de las matrículas de los  vehículos  que se encuentran allí

en-gb: The police is able to intercept the fled vehicle and detains the driver for previous charges. The others, though, go on consuming alcohol and blasting music
es: Se logra interceptar al vehículo fugado y se detiene a su conductor al tener antecedentes. El resto de los jóvenes vuelve a poner música y consumir alcohol

en-gb: The fight was stopped, but two officers had been injured.
es: Se intercede en la pelea con el resultado de varios heridos

en-gb: They could intercept the fled car and detain the driver. Thanks to the INSPEC2T they manage to find the rest of the group.
es: Se logra interceptar al vehículo fugado y se detiene a su conductor al tener antecedentes. El resto del grupo es localizado a posteriori gracias a INSPEC2T

en-gb: A man hits his wife in presence of their child.
es: Un varón golpea a su pareja en presencia del hijo de ambos

en-gb: The victim and the minor receive assistance from the CP
es: Atención a la víctima y al menor por parte del PB de la zona

en-gb: The aggressor takes the minor somewhere.
es: El agresor se lleva al menor del lugar

en-gb: Via INSPEC2T a witness uploads the recording of the escape of the aggressor and his location
es: A través de INSPEC2T un testigo de los hechos graba la huida del agresor y su localización

en-gb: Trace the aggressor, but not provide the victim with proper medical assistance.
es: Localización del agresor pero asistencia de la víctima deficiente

en-gb: They are able to localize the minor, but he is injured and his mother has irreversible head injuries since she never was given medical assistance
es: El menor ha sido localizado pero presenta lesiones de consideración, y la madre ha sufrido daños irreversibles por la demora en su atención sanitaria

en-gb: They provide medical assistance for the victim and her child. The police couldn´t find the aggressor
es: No se localiza al agresor pero se atiende a las víctimas

en-gb: Guarantee medical assistance for the victim and prevent the aggression against the minor due to his prompt localization.
es: Atención adecuada de la víctima y prevención de la agresión al menor al ser localizado con prontitud.

en-gb: The owner of the dog was injured while trying to stop the fight between his dog and another one on the dog beach
es: El dueño de un can ha sufrido heridas al interceder en una pelea entre su perro y otro, en la zona de baño para animales de la playa

en-gb: After having searched the area, the police wasn’t able to find neither the aggressor dog, nor his owner.
es: Tras realizar batidas por la zona no se consigue localizar al perro agresor ni a su dueño

en-gb: Via INSPEC2T a swimmer shares a panoramic photo of the area.
es: A través de INSPEC2T un bañista comparte una imagen panorámica de la zona

en-gb: They provided medical assistance for the injured person. The aggressor dog is still being sought. The injured dog dies
es: Se atiende a la persona lesionada y no se localiza al perro agresor. El perro agredido fallece.

en-gb: The aggressor dog is still being sought, but the injured person and his dog receive medical assistance on time
es: No se localiza al perro agresor pero la víctima es tratada y el perro herido es tratado a tiempo y no fallece.

en-gb: The injured person received medical assistance, the wounded dog was saved and due to the photo that added to the verbal description provided, the police was able to localize the owner of the aggressor dog with his pet
es: Tanto la persona que ha sufrido  el mordisco como su perro son atendidos a tiempo y gracias a la imagen compartida se logra contrastar la descripción verbal de los testigos , capturándose acto seguido al dueño y a su perro.

en-gb: In the surrounding area of the Mestalla football stadium broke windows and robbed from the inside few vehicles.
es:
dEn la zona de estacionamiento contigua al estadio de fútbol de Mestalla varios vehículos han sufrido robo de enseres por el 
método de fractura de luna

en-gb: Provide deterrent police presence and help and guidance for victims.
es: Presencia disuasoria policial y atención y asesoramiento a los afectados

en-gb: Provide deterrent police presence and help and guidance for victims.
es: Un aficionado localiza una cartera con documentación junto a uno de los vehículos dañados y lo comparte a través de INSPEC2T

en-gb: A witness shares through INSPEC2T the picture of a suspect who he has seen trying to force the lock of the vehicle.
es: Un testigo comparte a través de INSPEC2T una imagen de un sospechoso que ha visto intentando abrir un vehículo

en-gb: The police officer that coordinates theINSPEC2T compares the information from the ID from the wallet with the photo of the suspect and deduces that this is the same man. Later he found and detained due to the photos and documents..
es: El agente de policía coordinador de INSPEC2T coteja la información de la documentación hallada con la imagen subida a INSPEC2T y deduce que es la misma persona. Es localizada a posteriori gracias a la documentación y arrestada

en-gb: New robberies in another area occurred, one of them with physical violence. The suspect is still missing
es: localizada a posteriori gracias a la documentación y arrestada

en-gb: The author of the robberies is found and more damages are avoided. The owners of the damaged vehicles aren’t attended or advised
es: Se localiza al autor de los daños y se evitan nuevos robos, pero no se asesora a los afectados

en-gb: The affected people are attended; however the thief is missing
es: Se atiende y asiste a los afectados pero no se localiza al autor.

en-gb: A man is trying to climb a bridge in the old river channel of the city, with an obvious danger of fall
A girl who was seeing the situation decides to take a video and send it through INSPEC2T.
One anonymous citizen climbs the bridge trying to help the suicidal. Unfortunately he drops into the void.
An ambulance cares the “hero” in situ.
The police negotiation team arrive and catch the man while the negotiation was being performed. Unfortunately one office is damaged during the struggle with the man, trying to help him from falling
The man jumps and falls into the channel. Results seriously wounded.

The CPO of the area recognizes the suicidal and goes to the bridge, in order to convince him to stop his attempt, since he knows him for a long time. Makes the negotiation of the police team faster and the suicidal desists and goes down the bridge.
A woman has suffered a robbery of her wallet at the market
A witness can afford a description of the thief. The problem is that it is a vague description of the colthes that the burgular wears
While more patrols are looking for the suspect, two more customers of the market have also suffered robberies
The thief escapes wuthout being identified

Thanks to the stored data in the INSPEC2T system, the coordinator sends via INSPEC2T app images of usual suspects to the CPO. The witness recognizes one of them as the author of the robbery and the image is sent to the patrols in the area. Finally, one of the units catch the thief. The wallet is missing

The municipal services of clean up  while working in the area after the market find a wallet and send an image of it through INSPEC2T to the police coordinator. He compares the image and checks that is the one of the old woman. The woman is called to pick her wallet.
A bystander claims about the presence of an exhibitionist who has showed her his private parts
The CPO of the area is sent to try to locate the suspect. As the officer arrives, the suspect escapes
A group of minor students is harassed by the exhibitionist when they were going to visit the City of Arts & Sciences of Valencia
A witness aprehends the attitude of the exhibitionist and starts a fight with him, resulting injuries. The disturbed exhibitionist flees.

One INSPEC2T   user meets the injured man after the fight in the street and brings a complete description of him. Has recorded the all
 whole incident and sends it through the system.
Thanks to the police presence this day the suspect will not appear in the area for a while, but surely in the next days will return to the area to continue his criminal actions.
All the patrols in the area are trying to find the suspect. Thanks to the support of the info submitted  through INSPEC2T   the exhibitionist is found and arrested
A 5 year old boy disappears from the inside of a church, with a stranger
Since the place is a crowded area of tourism, some user could bring information of the child. 20 users send information of potential lost boys, but none of them match with the required
One patrol is required and is in the area looking for the boy, with the description given by the parents. Is complicated to find anyone between many people.

The representative of the neighborhood association of the area, as a request of the INSPEC2T   coordinator, gives information of potential eyewitnesses, like one beggar who is always near the main door of the church but leaves the place when the police arrive. He usually spends his time in a near park.
Two more patrols are in the area, including CPO walking in the area, the child is still missing
Although the number of police effectiveness increases, the lack of useful witness information results in a failure of finding the child
One boy, the disappeared one, appear in the proximities, naked and injured. Seems that has been raped. No one has seen the author of the aggression

The testimony of the beggar is crucial for solving the case. He saw one old aged man with a boy getting in a parked car. The car is founded in the very moment when the man was trying to abuse the child. The man is captured and the boy is rescued without damage.
A group of people have been seen dumping some kind of materials in a public plot
One patrol with two police officers go to the area and find household appliances and debris, but no one is there
Some neighbours give details of a van seen there minutes before. The plate mentioned appears to belong to a stolen van
Two police vehicles are patrolling the area and one of them locates the robbed car. There are no fingerprints or signs of the owners
Some claims about burglaries in the neighbourhood are incoming

In the INSPEC2T   archive, the coordinator finds info about previous incidents in the area about burglaries. The address of the gang is
Stored
The stolen van is recuperated, but the group of burglars have escaped
The presence of police patrols in the area avoid the group of burglaries committing more robberies, but flee from there before the arrival of the officers
Thanks to the stored info in the system one patrol verifies the address mentioned are stored stolen materials from houses in the area. The owner of the house is arrested
In a close park of the school a numerous student’s group is  coming together, apparently to organize a big fight.
One CPO is sent to speak with the youth group and, when he tries to mediate with them, receives a hit in his head with a bottle of glass, resulting wounded.
Both groups begin to fight
The concierge take pictures of the members of the group and send those through the system, recognizing some of the young boys as students of the school
One police motorbike and two police patrols arrives but only find two students with serious wounds, produced by a knife.

The images sent by the concierge and the information of some of the contenders give the clue to identify previous facts of fights in the area. But another witness and user of the system sends another picture of a young boy fleeing while carrying a bloody knife with large size.
After the aggression, the group escapes, leaving the CPO on the ground , wounded.
The police patrols require an ambulance to assist the injured students.  Some of the participants involved in the fight are arrested, but not the one with the knife.
The images of the bloody knife’s owner bring the solution of the author of the injuries to the students, and the information of the concierge gives the address of the main suspect of the attack.
At the main entry of the city a group of false police officers stops cars to fine them and get cash, mainly foreign cars.
A two officer’s patrol is sent to the place. However, as the group see the police arriving, rob a car and flee from there quickly. Begins a pursuit.
Some INSPEC2T users bring information about the car robbed in their escape.

In order to slow down the traffic in the city and stop the robbed car, the coordinator of INSPEC2T decides to demand a regulation of the red phase in the traffic lights, and this makes the robbed car get trapped in a main avenue by prolonging this phase
Requesting info from the users brings data of the plate of the robbed car but an incident of this quickness requires a patrol response
Waiting in this type of quick frauds causes the success of the criminal Act
The stopped traffic leads to the arrest of the gang by the patrol who was chasing them
Two neighbor women are disputing and begin to fight, not only verbally
Two neighbor women are disputing and begin to fight, not only verbally
Another neighbor of the women records the insults hiding himself in his home, and the women don’t notice it. He sends the recording through INSPEC2T.

After a while, one woman enters at her home and takes a kitchen knife, and attacks the other women, who results seriously injured. In the fight, the attacker woman falls downstairs, hitting her head with the floor, remaining unconscious
Two women seriously injured, being no clues of who was the attacker, since both of them have a different version of the facts.
Listening the recorded archive of the witness is possible to determinate who was the attacker in first place, solving the case
Close to the entrance of the train station appears a left suitcase
Close to the entrance of the train station appears a left suitcase
The patrol that arrives to the place sees no danger and takes the suitcase to deliver it at the lost property office of the city
One train driver who was ending his shift sees a nervous man leaving deliberately a suitcase at the entrance of the train station. He decides to send the advice through INSPEC2T.
According to the message received of the witness, the police coordinator decides to begin the protocol of objects left that could represent a menace. Call  the bomb disposal experts
One explosion occurs in the Xativa Street. One police patrol is completely destroyed and two police officers are dead. The suitcase contained a bomb.

The minor who took the suitcase goes to a kindergarten near from there to open it. Suddenly, a big explosion occurs. Unfortunately, the suitcase explodes, killing the minor and also two children who were playing in the playground
The bomb disposal experts discover a bomb in the suitcase. The area is cordoned off by another police units and, finally, the bomb is disconnected
At the kitchen of the “Convento Jerusalén” falla, a fire begins
One patrol arrives and enter in the local while the firemen are coming, to rescue some people who were yet inside.
Three police patrols arrive and cordon off the surrounding area, waiting for the firemen
One “fallero” sends an image of the inside of the space and the coordinator sees fireworks and firecrackers in the image
The first police patrols rescue some people but suddenly a great explosion (the fireworks and firecrackers stored) causes serious burn injuries on them and also on other falleros
Once the firemen have arrived and begin to do their work, an explosion occurs and hurts some of them, because the firecrackers stored.

The information provided through the image allows to the police units to prevent the firemen of the presence of the firework stored, and they act on that assumption, without exposing themselves to a dangerous situation.
At a rave of minors, one security guard sees traffic dealers selling drugs
One patrol is required and decides to enter in the enclosure. There are many people, and, when a traffic dealer sees the effectives, escapes from the inside

Some minors, as they see the police chasing the dealers, begin to run since they are in possession of drugs. Unfortunately, this creates a chain reaction and everybody begins to run. An avalanche of people occurs.

Since there are in the place around 2000 people, its preferable to use more police effectives in order to manage the situation. With 6 police officers is possible to stablish a check at the entrance to identify the suspects
The security guard takes images of the group while were selling drugs
10 minors are seriously injured by crushing and the dealers have fled
At the checkpoint the officers confiscate 50 g of cocaine and another dangerous drugs, and make 5 arrests
The images, taken in a crowded place and in the darkness, are useless for law enforcement purposes
One lion has escaped from its jail in a careless mistake of the keeper, at the municipal zoo called “Bioparc”

A two officer’s patrol is sent to the place. With their guns ready, they try to find the lion. During the research, one  officer is injured by the lion and the other tries to shoot, but fails and the lion escapes into the park
While the rest of the patrols arrive, the lion has attacked one group of students who were visiting the park this morning
The chairman of the zoo shares a map of the enclosure through INSPEC2T, and highlights the area where he believes the lion is going
The confrontation between the lion and the police results in a slashed arm of the officer and the escape of the lion
Some students are injured and the lion is shot by the police effectives.

The information of the specific area where probably the lion goes allow the police to mobilize resources of action (such as take tranquilizer darts avoiding guns, since the area is out of danger for the visitors) in order to not killing the animal. Finally is found and immobilized.
A fisherman slips into the sea while was fishing at the breakwater.

A two officer’s patrol is sent to the place. The officers prevent the rest of the fishermen to dive into the sea in their attempt to rescue the rugged. Even so, one officer decides to do it by himself.
Waiting for a patrol boat causes that the rest of the fishermen try to rescue their partner and now 4 people are drowning. The patrol rescue 2 of them, but the other 2 are lost.
Thanks to the INSPEC2T system, some captains of pleasure boats in the area decide to help in the rescue as they saw the alert in INSPEC2T.

Although no fishermen are jeopardizing themselves thanks to the quick presence of the patrol, unfortunately the office can’t find the fallen fisherman. Two days later, a dead body is found in the beach
One police patrol boat arrives to the area and can rescue half of the fishermen in the sea, but due to the bad conditions of the water, returns to the port. Two fishermen are disappeared.
Despite the police patrol boat only has rescued two fishermen, the rest of the drowned fishermen are rescued by the pleasure boats
